title: Can we recite duas that are not from the Sunnah or Quran? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: so there are supplications that are beautiful that are not from the authentic sunnah or backed by the hadith nor from the quran yet the meaning is beautiful can we recite this the answer is yes you can definitely recite do uh make your own dua take someone's dua and use it when supplicating to allah providing you do not think that this is related to the sunnah nor it has special powers or it has a profound impact simply because it cut its from the heart and you feel that it is sincere and you're asking allah azzawajal or supplicating allah there's no problem in that insha allah
